tool_description:
If you're after getting the Twitch user total amount of followers, this is just the right API for you. 
1. ```Get user profile details``` it allows you to grab the user ID from the user profile
2. ```Get user total followers``` it allows you to grab the total number of followers

More endpoints from the Twitch profile to come
name: Twitch profile stats
title: Twitch profile stats

api_list.name: Get user total followers
api_list.description: This enpoint is recommened for getting the user total followers from the profile.  ```to_id```  parameter is required and can be generated with the help of the ```/users/``` endpoint available under Twitch profile stats application on RapidAPI API hub

api_list.name: Get user profile details
api_list.description: This enpoint is recommened for getting the user ID (to_id) that will eventually be used on the get followers endpoint
